long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app allows you to highlight important information you find on the internet and index it in our LIGHT search engine. The internet is full of useless content. Collectively as a group we can highlight the most important parts of the internet and create a search engine around it so that you can find the important information you need faster.

You can organize content by username, groups and projects but do not have to. It's good for example if you want to create a group of like minded individuals so that you can search what they are highlighting.
